## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G42020](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G42020)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>BIP, BIP2, HSP70-12</u>
- **Gene Name:** luminal binding protein
- **Description:**   Heat shock protein 70 (Hsp 70) family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
